title: How to Make a Car from a Matchbox

steps.headline: Stick an eraser on the top of the matchbox.
steps.description: This will work as the car's roof and interior area.

steps.headline: Use bottle caps for the wheels.
Open the matchbox.
steps.description: Make sure it has space for keeping things in (see "Tips").

steps.headline: Paint the matchbox and eraser in your favourite colour.
Draw windows and doors for the car.

text: Find an empty matchbox.  Stick an eraser on the top of the matchbox. This will work as the car's roof and interior area. Use bottle caps for the wheels. Stick on the bottle caps. Open the matchbox. Make sure it has space for keeping things in (see "Tips"). Paint the matchbox and eraser in your favourite colour. Paint the wheels in black. Draw windows and doors for the car. Enjoy!
sentences: Stick an eraser on the top of the matchbox.
This will work as the car's roof and interior area.
Use bottle caps for the wheels.
Make sure it has space for keeping things in (see "Tips").
Paint the matchbox and eraser in your favourite colour.
Draw windows and doors for the car.
